column4: hello. i'm using windows vista (yes, don't laugh too much) and i'm trying to install ubuntu 9.10 via Wubi. i do not wish to use any other installation method, e.g. via .iso. i've tried many wubi EXEs and none seem to work for me
Windows must be on the C drive for Wubi,  also a partitioned install is much better in the long run, from the Live CD
my wubi910.exe (i've tried various revisions) complains: "Can not download the metalink and therefore the ISO"
